last_episode_to_air.name: The Tale of The Old Brown's New Roost

name: Peter Rabbit
overview: Nickelodeon brings treasured literary icon Peter Rabbit to life with the new CG-animated preschool series, Peter Rabbit. The series is a fresh re-imagining of the popular Beatrix Potter childrenâ€™s books based on Peter Rabbit. Peter Rabbit features educational goals that encourage preschoolers to learn problem-solving and interpersonal skills, self-efficacy, resilience, positive re-framing and fostering an interest in and respect for nature.

seasons.name: Specials
seasons.overview: Join Peter and his two bosom buddies; Benjamin and Lily, on their whimsical adventures through timeless Lake District. Peter encounters real dangers, and he and his loyal friends and family must use their wits to outsmart incompetent villains whose barks are way worse than their bites. Peter is a 6-year-old rabbit who lives with his mother underneath a huge fir tree in a hidden burrow. He misses his late father and desperately wants to grow up to be just like him. Armed with his father's journal, which is basically a guide to everything one needs to become a truly wild rabbit, and aided and abetted by his two best friends, Benjamin and Lily, Peter sets off to make his own mark in life.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Join Peter and his two bosom buddies; Benjamin and Lily, on their whimsical adventures through timeless Lake District. Peter encounters real dangers, and he and his loyal friends and family must use their wits to outsmart incompetent villains whose barks are way worse than their bites. Peter is a 6-year-old rabbit who lives with his mother underneath a huge fir tree in a hidden burrow. He misses his late father and desperately wants to grow up to be just like him. Armed with his father's journal, which is basically a guide to everything one needs to become a truly wild rabbit, and aided and abetted by his two best friends, Benjamin and Lily, Peter sets off to make his own mark in life.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Join Peter and his two bosom buddies; Benjamin and Lily, on their whimsical adventures through timeless Lake District. Peter encounters real dangers, and he and his loyal friends and family must use their wits to outsmart incompetent villains whose barks are way worse than their bites. Peter is a 6-year-old rabbit who lives with his mother underneath a huge fir tree in a hidden burrow. He misses his late father and desperately wants to grow up to be just like him. Armed with his father's journal, which is basically a guide to everything one needs to become a truly wild rabbit, and aided and abetted by his two best friends, Benjamin and Lily, Peter sets off to make his own mark in life.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Radish Robber
episodes.overview: Peter and his friends try to find the perfect place to eat the radishes they took from Mr. McGregor's garden, but little do they know they've got a radish robber on their tails!

episodes.name: The Tale of Two Enemies
episodes.overview: When Peter decides to set Mr. Tod and Tommy Brock against each other, he soon finds out that breaking the food chain is harder than it looks.

episodes.name: The Tale of Benjamin's Strawberry Raid
episodes.overview: When Benjamin takes charge of a strawberry harvest raid, he learns that it's harder than he thought to be a good leader.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Lying Fox
episodes.overview: When Mr. Tod is trapped in Mr. McGregor's garden, Peter agrees to help him escape, but soon learns that you should never trust a fox!

episodes.name: The Tale of the Greedy Fox
episodes.overview: When Peter tells an impulsive lie, which leads Jemima Puddle-Duck into Mr. Tod's clutches, he must act fast to stop her from becoming the fox's dinner

episodes.name: The Tale of the Secret Treehouse
episodes.overview: Peter proves he's got what it takes to be part of the squirrel tribe when he competes for his own treetop hideout.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Angry Cat
episodes.overview: When Peter accidentally brings home Mr. McGregor's Cat he's got to find a way to lure the angry cat back into the garden while staying one step ahead of her claws!

episodes.name: The Tale of Mr. Tod's Trap
episodes.overview: When Peter, Benjamin and Lily are tempted by a mysterious hoard of radishes, Lily finds herself caught in Mr. Tod's trap. Can Peter find a way to rescue Lily before Mr. Tod reaches her?

episodes.name: The Tale of Nutkin on the Run
episodes.overview: When Squirrel Nutkin angers Old Brown by taking his glasses, it's up to Peter and his friends to put things right.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Wriggly Worms
episodes.overview: When Peter makes a rash promise to appease an angry Tommy Brock, he and his friends find themselves worming for their lives!

episodes.name: The Tale of Jemima's Egg
episodes.overview: When Peter is asked to watch Jemima's egg, he discovers that babysitting is far more dangerous than he could ever have imagined.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Lucky Four Leaf Clover
The Tale of the Unguarded Garden
episodes.overview: When Mr. McGregor goes away for the day, Peter can't wait to raid the garden. But will the absence of one foe leave our hero and his little sister at the mercy of another?

episodes.name: The Tale of the Great Breakout
episodes.overview: When Mr. McGregor captures the whole squirrel tribe in his garden, Peter must stage a mass break out to save his friends.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Big Move
episodes.overview: When Lily's father decides to move the family out of the Lake District, Peter comes up with a clever, but dangerous, plan to change Dr. Bobtail's mind.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Lost Tunnels
episodes.overview: When Benjamin gets lost in a network of underground tunnels, Peter and Lily set out to find him.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Dash in the Dark
episodes.overview: When Peter and his friends go into the woods at night to catch a jar full of glowworms for Cotton-tail's night light, they discover Cotton-tail isn't the only rabbit afraid of the dark.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Grumpy Owl
episodes.overview: Old Brown takes Peter's journal, leaving the rabbit to decide between his most treasured possession and his friend.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Downhill Escape
episodes.overview: Peter takes Benjamin and Lily on a wild ride down a steep slope. But when Benjamin gets injured, Peter has to navigate them to safety past the clutches of Old Brown and Tommy Brock.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Cat and the Rat
episodes.overview: The wicked Sammy Whiskers drives Jemima and the ducklings from their coop, so Peter enlists the unwitting help of Mr McGregor's Cat to set things right.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Mother's Day Pie
episodes.overview: When Peter forgets to get his mother a present for Mother's Day, his hurried attempts to put things right leads to adventure.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Mystery Plum Thief
episodes.overview: When Peter tries to get the last plum from Mr. McGregor's tree, he finds that a mysterious thief has beaten him to it!

episodes.name: The Tale of the Hazelnut Raid
episodes.overview: When Peter accidentally destroys the squirrels' store of nuts with one of Mr Bouncer's misfiring inventions, he sets off to perilous Owl Island to replace them!

episodes.name: The Tale of the Broken Bed
episodes.overview: Peter breaks the bed his father made for him, and fixing it leads to an unexpected adventure.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Hero Rabbit
episodes.overview: Benjamin is mistaken for a hero by a band of mice and enlisted to get their stolen peas back.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Falling Rock
episodes.overview: Peter and his friends must save Mrs. Tiggy-Winkle from a landslide.

episodes.name: The Tale of the One Who Got Away
episodes.overview: Peter and his friends attempt to catch a large trout.

episodes.name: The Tale of Cottontail's New Friend
episodes.overview: Cottontail leaves the burrow in search of her new playmate.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Runaway Kites
episodes.overview: Peter and Lily must work together to rescue Benjamin.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Surprising Sisters
episodes.overview: Flopsy and Mopsy insist on accompanying Peter on one of his adventures.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Giant Pumpkin
episodes.overview: Peter sets his sights on the biggest pumpkin in Mr. McGregor's patch.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Fierce Bad Rabbit
episodes.overview: Peter and his friends set out to taste the sweetest dandelions in the world.

episodes.name: The Tale of Cottontail's Cake
episodes.overview: Cottontail's birthday cake is stolen.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Terrible Trap
episodes.overview: The predators create a plan to get rid of Peter.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Flying Fox
episodes.overview: Peter finds a mysterious key hidden in his father's journal.

episodes.name: The Tale of Old Brown's Feather
episodes.overview: Peter takes one of Old Brown's tail-feathers.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Lost Ladybird
episodes.overview: Peter accidentally loses Lily's ladybug.

episodes.name: The Tale of Old Rusty
episodes.overview: Peter travels to Rocky Island to find the mysterious Old Rusty mentioned in his father's journal.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Peekaboo Rabbits
episodes.overview: When Benjamin and Cotton-tail become lost in the Shadowy Woods during a game of peek-a-boo, can Peter use this very same game to help them elude a prowling Mr. Tod? When Jeremy Fisher gets into trouble while composing a new piece, only Peter and his friends can save him!

episodes.name: The Tale of Jeremy Fisher's Musical Adventure
episodes.overview: Peter and his pals mount a rescue for Jeremy Fisher, who's landed in some hot water.

episodes.name: The Tale of Benjamin's Map
episodes.overview: When Benjamin gets lost in the woods Peter and Lily give him a map. Mr Tod gets his hands on the map and the rabbits must work to stop him finding their home.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Wrecked Treehouse
episodes.overview: When a storm wrecks the rabbits' tree house, piecing it back together leads to adventure.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Squeaky Toy
episodes.overview: Peter loses Cotton-tail's squeaky rabbit toy.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Flying Rabbits
episodes.overview: When Peter learns that his father once crash-landed a flying machine into Mr McGregor's garden, he vows to find it and fly it home!

episodes.name: The Tale of Jeremy Fisher's Recital
episodes.overview: Sammy Whiskers and Mr Tod crash Jeremy Fisher's annual lakeside get-together.

episodes.name: The Tale of True Friends
episodes.overview: Peter feels unimportant until Lily and Benjamin need him to rescue them from Mr. McGregor's garden.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Uninvited Badger
episodes.overview: Tommy Brock gets too cold and heads to Bouncer's Burrow for warmth.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Brewing Storm
episodes.overview: Peter and his pals try to retrieve Cotton-Tail's lost blanket before a big storm arrives.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Stolen Firewood
episodes.overview: Peter, Lily and Benjamin have some trouble when they go out to collect firewood.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Runaway Rabbit
episodes.overview: Peter is left to babysit Cotton-tail but can't resist an event at the squirrel camp.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Join Peter and his two bosom buddies; Benjamin and Lily, on their whimsical adventures through timeless Lake District. Peter encounters real dangers, and he and his loyal friends and family must use their wits to outsmart incompetent villains whose barks are way worse than their bites. Peter is a 6-year-old rabbit who lives with his mother underneath a huge fir tree in a hidden burrow. He misses his late father and desperately wants to grow up to be just like him. Armed with his father's journal, which is basically a guide to everything one needs to become a truly wild rabbit, and aided and abetted by his two best friends, Benjamin and Lily, Peter sets off to make his own mark in life.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Puddleduck Disaster
episodes.overview: When Jemima is short on flapjack ingredients, she misunderstands Peter's advice and heads to Mr McGregor's garden.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Squirrel Hotpot
episodes.overview: Mr Tod catches Squirrel Nutkin and takes him to Owl Island to get a squirrel recipe from Old Brown.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Tunnel Rumbler
episodes.overview: When Peter and his friends mistake Jeremy Fisher for a scary monster, they set about ridding their tunnels of the invader.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Frightened Fox
episodes.overview: Peter raids Mr. Tod's lair and gets caught inside.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Best Bowler
episodes.overview: A pine cone bowling rivalry between Peter and Nutkin gets out of hand and causes trouble.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Great Potato Plunder
episodes.overview: Peter hears about his father's greatest ever heist and embarks on some high-risk highway robbery, setting his sights on Mr McGregor's wheelbarrow of potatoes bound for the market.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Cotton-tail's Treetop Tumble
episodes.overview: After Old Brown snatches her, Cotton-tail gets stuck up a tree. It's up to Peter, Lily and Benjamin to rescue her.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Perilous Party
episodes.overview: When Peter discovers Mr Tod is the host of a surprise party, he must save the guests from becoming party food.

episodes.name: The Tale of the High-Flying Badger
episodes.overview: A sleepy Tommy Brock is hoisted up into the Squirrel Camp.

episodes.name: The Tale of Benjamin's Blunder
episodes.overview: When Peter realises he has accidentally upset Benjamin by asking him to sit out the next garden raid, he goes to apologise, only to find his cousin has gone.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Tiny Terror
episodes.overview: Peter's plans to raid Mr McGregor's garden are thwarted when he discovers the Shrew has got there first.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Treehouse Rescue
episodes.overview: When Peter is forced to reveal the location of the secret treehouse to Flopsy and Mopsy, the girls decide to hang out in Peter's den -- just as Old Brown launches a tree-top attack!

episodes.name: The Tale of the Lost Journal
episodes.overview: When Benjamin accidentally loses Peter's dad's journal, it falls into the clutches of Mr Tod.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Need for Seed
episodes.overview: When Mr McGregor fills a bird table with sunflower seeds, Squirrel Nutkin becomes dangerously obsessed with raiding it. Also known as "The Tale of the Seed Snatch" in the UK.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Heroic Hedgehog
episodes.overview: Peter escapes a very chatty Mrs Tiggy-Winkle to go strawberry-raiding, but soon gets into trouble.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Bird Trap
episodes.overview: Mr Tod's efforts to creep up on the rabbits are thwarted by a noisy song thrush, so he cages the bird.

episodes.name: The Tale of Dr. Bobtail's Adventure
episodes.overview: Squirrel Nutkin gets sick, so Dr. Bobtail must visit him by sneaking onto Owl Island.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Locked Cage
episodes.overview: Peter forms an alliance with a rat in order to get out of a cage.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Missing Ducklings
episodes.overview: A simple matter of duckling-sitting turns into a potential disaster when the ducklings escape into the wood.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Hungry Thieves
episodes.overview: When Sammy Whiskers dupes three innocent mice into stealing the rabbits' plum pie, Peter must rescue both pie and mice from the clutches of Mr Tod.

episodes.name: The Tale of Nutkin's Rabbity Day
episodes.overview: When the Squirrel Tribe forget his birthday, Nutkin quits the squirrel life and decides to become a rabbit.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Unexpected Hero
episodes.overview: When Peter invites Jeremy Fisher along for a garden raid, the melodramatic frog gives him more than he bargained for.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Amazing Mum
episodes.overview: When Mr Tod and Sammy Whiskers team up to strike the rabbits' big picnic, Peter must team up with the only rabbit who can match him for speed and cunning - his mum.

episodes.name: The Tale of Mum's Precious Things
episodes.overview: When Peter accidentally discards his mother's most precious possessions he must retrieve them from Tommy Brock!

episodes.name: The Tale of the Racing Rabbit
episodes.overview: When the rabbits volunteer to deliver Mrs Tiggy-Winkle's laundry by go-kart, a routine delivery turns into a high-speed adventure!

episodes.name: The Tale of Fred Snail
episodes.overview: Peter Rabbit wants to grow up to be just like his late father, with the help of his father's journal and his best friends Benjamin and Lily

episodes.name: The Tale of the Saving of the Shrew
episodes.overview: When Mr Tod tramples on the Shrew's precious dandelions, the angry Shrew vows revenge. But when Cotton-tail follows him into Mr Tod's lair, Peter, Lily and Benjamin must go on a dangerous mission to rescue them both!

episodes.name: The Tale of the Fish Out of Water
episodes.overview: When Old Brown catches their friend Jack Sharp, Peter, Lily and Benjamin must race to return this fish-out-of-water to the lake!

episodes.name: The Tale of Cotton-tail's Party
episodes.overview: When Peter gives the Shrew some worms to entice him to Cotton-tail's birthday party, he accidentally puts everyone in danger.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Thing-A-Ma-Jig
episodes.overview: When Mr Bouncer invents something that seemingly has no specific function, the rabbits endeavour to find out what it's for. But when Mr Tod comes after them, will the 'thing-a-ma-jig' be a help or a hindrance in their escape?

episodes.name: The Tale of the Big Badger Blunder
episodes.overview: When Tommy Brock decides to move in to the Farmyard, Mittens needs Peter Rabbit's help to evict him!

episodes.name: The Tale of the Squabbling Squirrels
episodes.overview: When Felix and Nutkin quarrel, leaving the Squirrel Camp in chaos, it's down to Peter to help them make up before disaster strikes...

episodes.name: The Tale of Peter's Great Escape
episodes.overview: When the rabbits find themselves surrounded, Peter is forced to create a brand new ingenious escape route.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Great Cake Chase
episodes.overview: When Peter is charged with minding Ginger and Pickles' store, he finds running a shop is no easy feat, especially with customers like Sammy Whiskers!

episodes.name: The Tale of the Go-Kart Getaway
episodes.overview: When Sammy Whiskers steals the rabbits' go-kart, with Cotton-tail on board, Peter needs to race faster than ever to rescue his sister!

episodes.name: The Tale of the New Hideout
episodes.overview: When the rabbits are forced out of their secret tree- house, they learn that finding a new hideout isn't the hard part... it's keeping it secret!

episodes.name: The Tale of the Christmas Star
episodes.overview: When Tommy Brock takes Cotton-tail's dolly, Peter soon discovers the only way to retrieve it is to give everyone in the woods what they want for Christmas...

episodes.name: The Tale of the Sleepy Hedgehog
episodes.overview: When Peter takes Mrs Tiggy-Winkle home in time for winter hibernation, he doesn't realise how much trouble she might be!

episodes.name: The Tale of the Spectacular Sledge
episodes.overview: When the rabbits find a hoard of winter vegetables, they build a sled to transport them.

episodes.name: The Tale of Cotton-Tail's Tooth
episodes.overview: When Cotton-tail is taken ill, Peter must fetch Dr Bobtail through the snow-covered woods. Mr Tod has other ideas.

episodes.name: The Tale of Tricky Tortoise
episodes.overview: Peter learns not to judge a book by its cover when he takes an elderly tortoise for a quiet walk in the woods.

episodes.name: The Tale of Mice on the Move
episodes.overview: When Peter promises to find the mice a new home, locating an alternative mouse house proves to be an adventure in itself.

episodes.name: The Tale of Mittens' New Friend
episodes.overview: When Mittens befriends Cotton-tail, their playful antics lead to trouble. Peter must race to save them.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Flooded Burrow
episodes.overview: Peter leaves the burrow's door open and it floods! As he and his family search for shelter, he realises there is no place like home.

episodes.name: The Tale of Spilled Milk
episodes.overview: When Peter, Lily and Benjamin accidentally spill Mittens's milk, they launch a daring mission to replace it.

episodes.name: The Tale of the First Bluebell
episodes.overview: Peter's plan to collect the year's first bluebell for his mother takes an unexpected turn when he finds it on Mr Tod's doorstep.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Great Tortoise Rescue
episodes.overview: When Peter accidentally sends a sleeping Mr Tolly floating off to Owl Island, he launches a rescue with his friends.

episodes.name: The Tale of the King of the Woods
episodes.overview: When Benjamin falls into Mr Tod's clutches, Peter and Lily lure the fox out of his lair with the promise of a crown...

episodes.name: The Tale of Musical Mayhem
episodes.overview: When Jeremy Fisher's recital attracts the attention of Mr Tod, Peter must get up to some musical mischief to save the day.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Missing Journal
episodes.overview: When Flopsy and Mopsy borrow Peter's journal, Peter has to save them from Old Brown - but will he lose his journal in the process? Also known as "The Tale of the Journal's End" in the UK.

episodes.name: The Tale of The Scare Owl
The Tale of The Old Brown's New Roost

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Join Peter and his two bosom buddies; Benjamin and Lily, on their whimsical adventures through timeless Lake District. Peter encounters real dangers, and he and his loyal friends and family must use their wits to outsmart incompetent villains whose barks are way worse than their bites. Peter is a 6-year-old rabbit who lives with his mother underneath a huge fir tree in a hidden burrow. He misses his late father and desperately wants to grow up to be just like him. Armed with his father's journal, which is basically a guide to everything one needs to become a truly wild rabbit, and aided and abetted by his two best friends, Benjamin and Lily, Peter sets off to make his own mark in life.
